page.title: 13Longwood Tower.
page.content: In 1861 Longwood Tower was built by a group of local men when they had little work to do. There was a gold plated plaque on the rock face until a few years ago when it vanished. Longwood tower is 25 feet high and has 26 steps to the top. Now Longwood Tower is quiet and deserted although below in Milnsbridge it is busy. By Longwood Tower there is an amphitheatre which was built in 1873 and rebuilt in 1930. "Longwood Sing" takes place here, although if it is to survive, it needs more singers. At the Longwood Sing they put a flag inside Longwood Tower. It usually takes place on a Sunday and the songs they sing are hymns and prayers. Paddock Youth Band sometimes play at the amphitheatre.
